title: Using calculator
text: Make sure the mode is set to radians. To find θ, use the inverse of the sine function. On most calculators, you will need to push the 2ND button and then the SIN button to bring up the $${sin}^{\left(-1\right)}$$ function.

title: Using calculator
text: For this problem, we enter $$0.8{sin}^{\left(-1\right)}$$, and press ENTER.

title: Using calculator
text: To four decimal places, what does $$0.8{sin}^{\left(-1\right)}$$ equal?
